title: Executive Order 6755-Gastonia, North Carolina, Designated as a Customs Port of Entry
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 1 of the act of August 1, 1914 (ch. 223, 38 Stat. 609, 623; 19 U.S.C., sec. 2), Gastonia, North Carolina, is hereby designated as a customs port of entry in customs collection district no. 15 (North Carolina), with headquarters at Wilmington, North Carolina, effective as of this date.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6755-Gastonia, North Carolina, Designated as a Customs Port of Entry Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362531
